description: Access real-time and historical https://kalshi.com prediction market data across events, markets, and trades. Analyze forecasts and candlestick time series to track sentiment and price action. Search and filter by tickers, mints, categories, and sports to quickly find the data you need.

apiUrl.description: Base URL for the Prediction Market Metadata API

requestTimeout.description: Timeout for API requests in milliseconds

capabilities.name: get_event
capabilities.description: Get a single event by ticker. Returns event metadata including series ticker, subtitle, markets, strike information and volume.

capabilities.name: get_events
capabilities.description: Get a paginated list of all events with optional filtering and sorting.

capabilities.name: get_market
capabilities.description: Get details of a market by ticker.

capabilities.name: get_market_by_mint
capabilities.description: Get a market by looking up its mint address.

capabilities.name: get_markets
capabilities.description: Get a paginated list of markets with optional filtering.

capabilities.name: get_markets_batch
capabilities.description: Get multiple markets by tickers and/or mint addresses (up to 100 results).

capabilities.name: get_trades
capabilities.description: Get a paginated list of trades across markets with optional filtering.

capabilities.name: get_trades_by_mint
capabilities.description: Get trades for a market identified by a mint address.

capabilities.name: get_forecast_percentile_history
capabilities.description: Get historical raw and formatted forecast numbers for an event at specified percentiles.

capabilities.name: get_forecast_percentile_history_by_mint
capabilities.description: Get forecast history by looking up an event using a market mint address.

capabilities.name: get_event_candlesticks
capabilities.description: Get event candlesticks from the Kalshi API. Resolves series ticker automatically.

capabilities.name: get_market_candlesticks
capabilities.description: Get market candlesticks. Resolves series ticker automatically.

capabilities.name: get_market_candlesticks_by_mint
capabilities.description: Get candlesticks by looking up a market by mint address.

capabilities.name: get_live_data
capabilities.description: Get live data from the Kalshi API for specific milestones.

capabilities.name: get_live_data_by_event
capabilities.description: Get live data for all milestones of an event.

capabilities.name: get_live_data_by_mint
capabilities.description: Get live data by looking up an event from a market mint address.

capabilities.name: get_series
capabilities.description: Get all series templates with optional filtering.

capabilities.name: get_series_by_ticker
capabilities.description: Get a single series by its ticker.

capabilities.name: get_outcome_mints
capabilities.description: Get a flat list of yes and no outcome mint pubkeys.

capabilities.name: filter_outcome_mints
capabilities.description: Filter a list of addresses and return only outcome mints.

capabilities.name: get_tags_by_categories
capabilities.description: Get a mapping of series categories to tags.

capabilities.name: get_filters_by_sports
capabilities.description: Get filtering options for each sport including scopes and competitions.

capabilities.name: search_events
capabilities.description: Search events with nested markets by title or ticker.
